description: Taking place after the events of Sly 2, it is confirmed that Murray is the one who saves Sly from Interpol at the end of the said game. Sly is ambiguously rescued in a helicopter from captivity at the end of the said game and it's never revealed completely who it is, although its strongly implied that it's Murray. The story of issue two is broken into four parts. The first part consists of Sly finding a member of his father's gang in a maximum-security prison due to an invitation. This member, McSweeny, after an initial tussle, apologizes to Sly for not being able to have raised him himself after the murder of Sly's parents, due to his confinement. McSweeny tells Sly of a massive vault on a remote island that contains the accumulated treasure of all the Cooper family members stating it as Sly's inheritance. Informing Sly of where to find the map to this vault, we cut to part two. Part two details Sly and Murray breaking into a hospital to rescue the injured Bentley from the authorities. Bentley is paralyzed due to the dramatic events at the conclusion of Sly 2. Sadly, Murray's once endless enthusiasm has waned and he has become increasingly insecure with his own actions. This is because he blames himself for Bentley's predicament. Sly worries about this, but concentrates on the matter at hand. The two convince Bentley to return with them, and comfort him by quelling his fears of being a burden on his friends. Just as the three are about to escape however, they are discovered and surrounded by police. In an uncharacteristically dark tone, Murray demands Sly take Bentley and escape while he deals with the officers. Although Murray seems to have the situation well under control, Sly and Bentley worry that Murray is taking the burden of things too much and isn't using teamwork anymore. Although worried for his friend, Sly takes Bentley to safety with the vow that he'll be back to help Murray whether he likes it or not.
name: Adventures of Sly Cooper

description:
Joe is a young man with no home, no purpose, and almost no friends...though he does have a very special cat. With a simple injection, Joe's cat can be anything: a weapon, a tool, or even a cuddly companion. But what, if anything, can transform Joe?!

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 1: Cat Master
  • Chapter 2: R&D
  • Chapter 3: Nowhere
  • Chapter 4: Eggface
  • Chapter 5: Shadowtown
  • Chapter 6: Wherehouse
  • Chapter 7: Skull
  • Chapter 8: Korea
  • Chapter 9: Strawberries
  • Chapter 10: Chalk
  • Chapter 11: Deeper
  • Chapter 12: Once Again
  • Chapter 13: Air and Water
  • Chapter 14: Out of Lucj
  • Chapter 15: Imperial
  • Chapter 16: Eat
  • Chapter 17: Stakeout
  • Chapter 18: Awake
name: Vol. 1

description: In life, Majeh was a gifted swordsman. In death he acts as a whimsical reaper for the King of Hell, collecting the souls of the dead to bring them to the netherworld. All this changes when a mysterious rift opens up between Hell and Earth and evil spirits begin escaping into the mortal realm. Now Majeh must hunt down and destroy these mischievous demons before the rift is permanently opened.
name: Vol. 1

description: In life, Majeh was a gifted swordsman. In death he acts as a reaper for the King of Hell, collecting souls of the dead and bringing them to the underworld. When a rift opens up between Hell and Earth, evil spirits begin escaping to the mortal realm and Majeh must hunt them down and destroy them before the rift is permanently opened.
name: Vol. 2

description: Deceased swordsman Majeh is sent back to life in the body of a teenage boy to capture the demons who are taking over the bodies of dead martial artists, and he joins forces with a young woman with the same name as his beloved Dohwa and a boy who is struggling to overcome his fears.
name: Vol. 3

description: For three hundred years, Majeh's spirit has served as the King of Hell's envoy, while Majeh's body lay preserved in a special hidden lake. However, when demons escape from the netherworld and hijack bodies in the world of the living, Majeh's spirit is restored to his body to hunt down the escapees...in less than a month. A master swordsman, Majeh is drawn to a town hosting a grand fighting competition. That same town is being plagued by strange and grisly murders. Could the two events somehow be connected? And, in a city full of fighters, could Majeh meet his match?
name: Vol. 4

description: Having survived an assassination attempt, Majeh enters a martial arts championship to discover the mystery behind this great and mysterious event. As luck would have it, the teams are divided by affiliation to good and evil sects, and like it or not, Majeh must side with the evil sect. As the battle for domination begins, Majeh discovers that his skills are more than enough to get through his scheduled matches and just when he begins to think that he has wasted his time, the man who ordered his assassination confronts him and announces his intention to finish what he started.
name: Vol. 5

description:
Proper Japanese Title: Otōto yo (弟よ)

After Sabo was killed by a Celestial Dragon for being "human garbage", Luffy and Ace vowed to always look out for each other. With Ace now dead, Luffy believes he has nothing to live for. When he remembers that he still has his crew, Luffy makes plans to go back to the archipelago where they were last together. The other Straw Hats, having been sent to different parts of the world by Kuma, quickly learn of this and find hidden meaning in Luffy's return.

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 585. Brothers' Sake Cups (兄弟盃, Kyōdai Sakazuki)
  • Chapter 586. A Fetid Town (悪臭のする町, Akushū no Suru Machi)
  • Chapter 587. I Will Not Run! (おれは、逃げない, Ore wa Nigenai)
  • Chapter 588. Sabo's Ocean (サボの海, Sabo no Umi)
  • Chapter 589. Efforts Toward Glory (風雲の志, Fūun no Kokorozashi)
  • Chapter 590. My Little Brother (弟よ, Otōto yo)
  • Chapter 591. You Sure That's Alright? (それでいいのか, Sore de Iinoka)
  • Chapter 592. Yell (エール, Ēru)
  • Chapter 593. News (NEWS, Nyūsu)
  • Chapter 594. Message (メッセージ, Messēji)
name: My Brother

description: The Three Insane Hounds run amok and cause serious havoc amongst the zombie horde. Meanwhile, Majeh senses the energy of the next world and must return to the battlefield at once. Rated for teens.
name: Vol. 12
Dollari in vacanza - Zio Paperone e l'aquila numismatica

description: This volume of King of Hell picks up on Raven Ghost Isle. The group must be able to overcome themselves before they face a greater evil. Is Majeh's new companion the answer to all his problems?
name: Vol. 14

description: As Majeh charges into a grueling battle against Jin Song and a vicious demonic wolf, Cerberus vows death before allowing Moon Ju escape. Chung Poong, Dohwa, and Young are needed in this hellish battle. Will they be able to put an end to Moon Ju wrath? It seems like the King of Hades has the answer--and he isn't afraid to give it to them...
name: Vol. 15

description: After Majeh defeats one of the escaped fiends, he is called back to the Moorim Headquarters, where the Martial Arts Leader gives him a mission: Search for the missing Insane Hounds, who have traveled into the Gobi Desert. With Crazy Dog joining Majeh and company, the party begins their travels to the desert. There's just one problem--Crazy Dog has been healed, but his brain capacity is that of a little boy...
name: Vol. 16

description: As Majeh and company journey to the Gobi desert in search of the Insane Hounds, we learn more about Majeh's past. Why is his master at the Dawn of Taoism hunting him down? And why are his friends trying to kill him? Is this the end for Majeh?
name: Vol. 17

description: Majeh reveals more of his past, and how he became such a strong fighter, as the group travels through the treacherous desert. But even more treacherous than where they are is where they are going as they search for the Insane Hounds at the Sa Gok headquarters. And even more treacherous than that is the desert rat they have as a guide. Will they be able to rescue the kidnapped martial artists--or is it too late...for everyone?
name: Vol. 18

description: In life, Majeh was a gifted swordsman. In death, he acts as a whimsical reaper for the King of Hell, collecting the souls of the dead to bring them to the netherworld. But when a rift opens up between Hell and Earth and evil spirits begin escaping to the mortal realm, Majeh and his human friends must hunt them down before they create hell on earth.Majeh and company have entered the lair of the Sa Goks and find themselves fighting some unique opponents: a man who can turn his body into rock, a living human doll and a team of irresistible beauties with murder on their minds!
name: Vol. 19

description:
At the request of the Martial Arts Leader, Majeh and his band of fighters followed the Insane Hounds to the Sa Gok headquarters. But now that they're here, will they be able to battle their way out? Young and Chung Poong are hard pressed to beat a Wolf man and steel-bodied boxer impervious to pain.

Meanwhile, Dohwa and Cerberus face a dark cavern of vicious living dolls. And Majeh, with only the simple-minded Crazy Dog and Insane Hounds to help him, must defeat a master of the din!
name: Vol. 20

description:
When Dohwa meets her little brother, heartbreaking memories of how their parents were killed and how theyy were tricked into serving the Sa Gok are revealed. Stragely, Dohwa's brother doesn't seem to have grown since when they were first taken by the Sa Gok. Meanwhile, the Sa Gok Lader has gathered Majeh and company together, threatening to kill either Dohwa or the whole gang! In order to save Dohwa, Majeh's first fight might be his last: He must battle the Three Insane Hounds---above a pit full of venomous snakes...

As a bonus side-story celebrating the 200th episode of King of Hell, join the ultimate crime scene investigation in which the victim is none other than... Majeh himself!
name: Vol. 21

description: The Sa Gok Leader and his minions find out that Majeh and company didn't intend on really fighting each other. They also learn that Majeh had deliberately tossed the Three Insane Hounds over the ledge in order to save Dohwa. So the Sa Gok Leader tells Majeh to come find him if he can survive a battle with the Sa Gok minions. Never the ones to turn down a challenge, Majeh and his crew spring into action as they battle General North, General South, a serpent and a metal doll!
name: Vol. 22

description:
Kasumi and her sister, Shizuku, were infected with the Medusa virus, which slowly eats away at the body. There is no cure, but of the two only Kasumi is selected to go into a cryogenically frozen state along with 159 others until a cure is found. In the undetermined future, Kasumi awakens to find herself and others, who were in suspended animation in an unfamiliar world with bloodthirsty monsters. Kasumi struggles to survive in a treacherous world in order to unlock its mysteries and learn the fate of her twin sister.

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 1: The Chosen Ones
  • Chapter 2: The People Trapped by Thorns
  • Chapter 3: That Day
  • Chapter 4: Face the Future
  • Chapter 5: The Thorn Girl
name: Vol. 1

description:
Narrowly escaping their island prison into a half-submerged tunnel. The watery path may look serene, but evil lurks in the inky depths with a mysterious girl watching their every move and monstrosities waiting to devour them. A shocking revelation will shatter the group to the core, ensuring that not all will continue onward to freedom...or answers.

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 6: Beyond the Dark Water
  • Chapter 7: One Down
  • Chapter 8: A Step to the Truth
  • Chapter 9: Level 4
  • Chapter 10: The Beat of Battle
  • Chapter 11: The Crown of Crosses and Thorns
name: Vol. 2

description:
Having faced multiple threats, the Medusa Virus survivors begin to probe further into what's happened. They have Peter's hard drive, but what will they find on it? And will they even have time to look? A new threat emerges that will find Marco face to face with the slimiest monster on this chillingly altered earth. The former mercenary has proved to be quite adept at staying alive, but will this confrontation be the one that puts him in the ground?

Story Titles

  • Chapter 12: The End of the World
  • Chapter 13: Deep Rift
  • Chapter 14: Dangerous Place
  • Chapter 15: What Really Happened That Day
  • Chapter 16: The Secrets of the Water
  • Chapter 17: The Rules of Trust
name: Vol. 3

description:
The horror deepens as the diminishing band of survivors struggles to keep sane--and alive. When a secret video reveals the truth behind the Medusa virus to Kasumi and the other survivors, will the revelation give them hope…or more despair? Also, why does Marco seem to know so much more about the situation than the others? The answers could rest in the very reason he was chosen to infiltrate "Level 4."

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 18: The Truth Behind Medusa
  • Chapter 19: Freefall
  • Chapter 20: Marco's Enemy
  • Chapter 21: The Bird to the Cage, Part 1
  • Chapter 22: The Bird to the Cage, Part 2
  • Chapter 23: The Bird to the Cage, Part 3
  • Chapter 24: Open Wound
name: Vol. 4

description:
With horrible monsters in pursuit, Kasumi and the survivors try their best to escape and rejoin Marco. But when all hope seems lost, one member will make a sacrifice that could save them all!

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 25: Loss
  • Chapter 26: A Part of the Heart
  • Chapter 27: Reunion With the Nemesis
  • Chapter 28: Alice's World
  • Chapter 29: Weakness and Reality
  • Chapter 30: Shizuku's Existence
  • Chapter 31: Conceit
name: Vol. 5

description:
With Marco defeated and Zeus threatening to use the terrifying power of Medusa to recreate the world, it's up to Kasumi to summon the courage to fight back. What is the final mystery surrounding Kasumi and her sister, Shizuku? And when it's revealed to Kasumi, will she have the strength to take the final step?

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 32: Marco's Death
  • Chapter 33: Reunion
  • Chapter 34: Resurrection
  • Chapter 35: The Final Fight
  • Chapter 36: Deep Throat
  • Final Chapter: Beyond the Emotions
name: Vol. 6

description: There's an urban legend a-buzzing about a mysterious group known as The Knockout Makers. As the myth goes, these individuals accept commissions and requests to make your average girl a totally hot knockout! A new hairstyle, advice on what not to wear, or an extreme makeover: Here are the true stories of the Knockout Makers--who endeavor to make the world a beautiful place, one girl at a time!
name: Vol. 1

description: Toshihiro, Nobuo and Ryouhei bring beauty and confidence to their next batch of damsels in distress. Be it "bears" from Osaka, sunburned brides or an adorable "four-eyes," these guys can bring out any girl's inner beauty! But after the girls realize they can get any man and any thing they want with their new looks, will their superficial desires be filled at the cost of others?
name: Vol. 2

description: Be they homely, happy, chubby or busty, the Knockout Makers exist to help girls feel beautiful, inside and out. They'll tackle any tangle, blush any cheek, cross dress if they have to, all in the name of feminine beauty. But after five years and nearly a hundred makeovers, are makeup artist Toshihiro, hair stylist Nobuo and fundamentals expert Ryouhei ready to retire?
name: Vol. 3

description: Princess Koiko has the power to unleash love for her in other people's hearts. However, it has no effect on her personal bodyguard, Shiro. Together, they just might have the most unexpected romance of the year! But can their love defeat the circumstances that threaten to keep them apart.
name: Vol. 1

description: Yuri’s forced proximity to Gwendal (thanks to the handcuffs) leads to a better understanding between the two. But they are soon separated after their trial for "elopement." Yuri is sent to a labor camp consisting of only women, many of whom had been caught trying to elope with their Mazoku lovers. The injustice towards these women and their children sends Yuri into Maoh Mode and bent on retribution. Who stops Yuri this time from slaughtering cowardly soldiers with sand golems? And what about the Demon Flute? Will Yuri ever be able to play it and bring the rain?
name: Vol. 6

description: Everything seems to have calmed down for the Maoh, until Yuri returns to his castle and finds that he has a love child! Is he even old enough to have fathered a ten year-old girl? If that wasn't bad enough, the tiny terror tries to kill Yuri and he twists his pivoting foot in the process. Eager to cheer Yuri up, Conrad arranges a trip to a famous human hot springs resort, but Yuri has stowed away his young assailant on board! Will she continue to attempt to assassinate Yuri or will Yuri's kindness win her over? And can Yuri even make it to the hot springs without getting himself into trouble?
name: Vol. 7
Ali-Ha-Ha and the Forty Thieves

description: Original edition in French.
name: The Towers of Meirrion

description:
Manga Contents

  • Ore no Sora

The I-Bots are a team of robots who were created as super-heroes to protect mankind. As this series begins, they must save one of their own, Killaine, who had been used as a pawn in the murder of a prominent politician. Although videotapes of the crime scene clearly show Killaine committing the brutal act, the team knows she couldn’t have done it, for like them, her own programming would have automatically reduced her to scrap had she murdered a human being.
First issue with free gift - sheet of WW2 combat stickers.
name: Battle 1

description: Tenth birthday issue.
name: Battle 514
